General.Name: Guangdong New Grand Long Packing Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong New Grand Long Packing Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of cigarette packing products. The company was formerly known as Chaozhou New Grand Long Packing Co., Ltd and changed its name to Guangdong New Grand Long Packing Co., Ltd. in 2010. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Chaozhou, China. Guangdong New Grand Long Packing Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Yize Holdings Co., Ltd.

1.Name: Ms. Yan Ping  Li
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer and Deputy Gen. Mang.

2.Name: Mr. Zhen Xi  Lin
2.Title: Chairman of the Supervisory Committee and Director of the Technical & Quality Department

3.Name: Ms. Xuan Xuan  Huang
3.Title: Mang. of Admin. Department & Non-Employee Supervisor
